name: Bullet Heaven (Epicrider)
description:
Game is best played in Full Screen!

DISCLAIMER 1: Playing with a Nintendo Switch Pro Controller is not recommended due to unforeseen issues with movement.
DISCLAIMER 2: The Rankings screen is currently not working, which means you cannot currently save your high score. If you'd like to save your high score, we recommend using a screen-capture program. You can also start a new game to see your previous score. You will have to restart the page if you want to completely restart the point system.

A "twin"-stick shooter with 2% aim and 200% righteousness. Fend off against endless waves of demonic forces, and let your name be known across the heavens.
Bullet Heaven was developed in 72 hours by StaticSavior (Epicrider), xKindredKinesis and 64bitpandas for ScoreSpace Jam 5. It can be played from the comfort of your HTML5-enabled browser.

Controls (Keyboard) -
W - Move Up
A - Move Left
S - Move Down
D - Move Right
J - Spin and Fire
K - Cast Halo
Escape - Pause

Controls (XBOX Gamepad) -
Up - Move Up
Left - Move Left
Down - Move Down
Right - Move Right
X - Spin and Fire
A or Y - Cast Halo Start - Pause

In-game music is property of Sagittarius V [Lucidator - Main Menu], Kick Puncher [Runner Gunner - Gameplay] and New Arcades [Find a Way - Rankings], under the label NewRetroWave. All music and sounds used with permission.
